name: AM BUSH.
description:
A submission for Weekly Game Jam week 191 themed "Ambush" - thrown together rather quickly in a couple evenings! 

(WebGL version has issues with FMOD so sound will be janky for a while, trying to fix this!)

Idle simulators are by design rather tedious, but this is meant to play similarly to idle sims like Clicker Heroes or Cookie Clicker (though not as robustly designed).
See below for cheats!

Game design/programming - James Langford (@JamesLango)
Music & Sound design - Sam H
3D assets - www.kenney.nl

CONTROLS:
Click the plant to do damage to it.

Cheats:

X - Deal 500 DMG.
C - Give yourself 500 power.
